greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Table read by rows: The coefficients of the polynomials P(n,x) = Sum{k=0..n}Sum{j=0..k}(-1)^j*2^(-k)*C(k,j)*(k-2*j)^n*x^(n-k).
comment: G(m,x) = 1/(1-m*sinh(x)) is the generating function of m^n*P(n,1/m).
GI(m,x) = 1/(1-m*sin(x)) is the generating function of m^n*P(n,I/m).
See A196776 for a row reversed form of this triangle. - Peter Bala, Oct 06 2011
mathematica: p[n_, x_] := Sum[(-1)^j*2^(-k)*Binomial[k, j]*(k-2*j)^n*x^(n-k), {k, 0, n}, {j, 0, k}]; t[n_, k_] := Coefficient[p[n, x], x, k]; t[0, 0] = 1; Table[t[n, k], {n, 0, 10}, {k, 0, n}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Jan 27 2014 *)
results.author: Peter Luschny, Aug 01 2011
